affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 事情, 真实的, 事物

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 透露真情的；有启迪作用的；袒胸露肩的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指揭露一直隐藏或隐秘的东西，或启示超乎常人领导能力的真理。
多指揭露丑闻、坏人坏事或各种阴谋。也可指某物暴露在外。
侧重指揭露或泄露鲜为人知或保密的事。
主要指移去遮盖物，让东西显露出来。也可指揭露阴谋、秘密等。

word_group.brief_definition: 清楚地揭示；清楚地显示

bilingual.target: 分析数据可以揭示重要的趋势。

bilingual.source: Analyzing big data can reveal market trends.
bilingual.target: 分析大数据可以揭示市场趋势。
空间分析可以揭示隐藏的模式。

bilingual.source: The magician flips the card to reveal the trick.
bilingual.target: 魔术师翻转卡片揭示了魔术。

bilingual.source: Lu Xun's novels reveal many social issues.
bilingual.target: 鲁迅的小说揭示了社会的许多问题。

bilingual.source: Analyzing the data can reveal important trends.
bilingual.target: 分析数据可以揭示重要的趋势。
她的回忆录揭示了许多不为人知的秘密。
移情可以揭示潜在的情感问题。

bilingual.source: Studying genetics can reveal the mysteries of life.
bilingual.target: 学习遗传学可以揭示生命的奥秘。

list.abstract: Reveal（英 [rɪˈviːl]，美 [rɪˈviːl]），英语单词，作动词为透露；暴露；泄露。作名词为侧墙面；窗侧。例句：It can reveal information about protected characteristics.（它可以揭示有关受保护特征的信息。） Reveal的近义词有make clear，prove，expose等。

yingyinNormal.en: You think they don't want to reveal the reason they knew about the drugs? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认为他们想隐瞒如何得知毒品运送的这件事？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: However, our examination of the vehicle did reveal a small amount of blood on the passenger side dashboard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，我们检查了车辆并且在副驾驶仪表盘上发现了少量血液。

yingyinNormal.en: When he dismissed her again, the old woman's out with her appearance melted away, to reveal a beautiful enchantress.
yingyinNormal.zh: 王子依然要驱赶她，这时候老妇人的丑陋顷刻消散，变成了一个非常美丽的女巫。

yingyinNormal.en: You know that I'm not at liberty to reveal the asset's genetic makeup. Modified animals are known to be unpredictable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我不能随意透露资产的基因成分，改良后的动物是不可预测的。

yingyinNormal.en: Once you've mastered that, I'm going to reveal how bread can be much more than just a loaf. It can be a meal in itself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦你掌握了，我将告诉你，面包不仅仅是面包，面包本身就是一道大餐。

yingyinNormal.en: Observations reveal that if I merely insert "awesome," "like," "omigosh," and giggle at everything like it's a question, I will assimilate into the general teenage population.
yingyinNormal.zh: 籍由观察后得出的结论，如果我仅仅说“太厉害了，“简直”，“我的天”， 对任何摸不着头脑的事都咯咯笑的话，我就能融入普通青少年群体。

yingyinNormal.en: Linguistics can even reveal other important historical clues, such as determining the geographic origins and lifestyles of ancient peoples based on which of their words were native, and which were borrowed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 语言学家们甚至可以发现其他重要的历史线索，比如确定地理起源和古代人的生活方式，这是基于他们的语言哪些是母语，哪些是外来语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 透露; 揭示; 显示
显露; 露出; 展示

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 出人意料的真相透露；揭露的惊人内幕；启示；揭露；透露；暴露；泄露；惊人的新发现；《启示录》
adj. 透露内情的；披露性的；暴露的；袒胸露背的

word_family.mean: v. 透露；暴露；泄露；揭示；揭露；使显露；展现；显示；启示

sense_info_list.en: make previously unknown or secret information known to others
sense_info_list.zh: 透露; 揭示; 显示

examination_example.sentence: The new research <highlight>reveals</highlight> that the need to know is so strong that people will seek to satisfy their curiosity even when the answer will hurt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项新的研究表明，求知的需求是如此强烈，以至于人们会寻求答案来满足自己的好奇心，即使答案会伤人。

examination_example.sentence: So when young people are critical of an over-tweeting president, they <highlight>reveal</highlight> a mental discipline in thinking skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，当年轻人批评一位发推过多的总统时，他们揭示了思维技能方面的精神纪律。

examination_example.sentence: Nor does it <highlight>reveal</highlight> how much companies are banking on the halo effect, rather than the other possible benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它也没有揭示企业有多少是指望光环效应，而不是其他可能的好处。

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow something to be seen
sense_info_list.zh: 显露; 露出; 展示

word_usage.usage:
表示“揭露”
reveal指揭露此前不为人知或隐秘的事，常可与disclose换用，expose尤指揭露丑闻、阴谋等不好的事。
disclose指公开某事，尤指不为人知的或被隐瞒的事。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“揭示、显示、暴露”，常指使人知道了隐藏的秘密或看到某人的品质和企图等。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 出人意料的真相透露；揭露的惊人内幕；启示；揭露；透露；暴露；泄露；惊人的新发现；《启示录》

word_family.mean: v. 透露；暴露；泄露；揭示；揭露；使显露；展现；显示；启示

sense_info_list.en: make previously unknown or secret information known to others

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>reveal</highlight> information about protected characteristics like age, race, nationality, disability, gender, religion, etc., and that could bias a hiring decision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以揭示关于受保护特征的信息，如年龄、种族、国籍、残疾、性别、宗教等，这可能会影响招聘决定。

examination_example.sentence: Notre Dame Cathedral was within "15 to 30 minutes" of complete destruction, French authorities have <highlight>revealed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国当局透露，巴黎圣母院在“15到30分钟”内完全被毁了。

examination_example.sentence: In a study published in Nature Scientific Reports, we <highlight>reveal</highlight> just how deep this injustice runs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在《自然科学报告》上发表的一项研究中，我们揭示了这种不公正现象到底有多严重。

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow something to be seen

examination_example.sentence: What the research <highlight>revealed</highlight> was the rather less surprising result: the educational benefits of selective schools largely disappear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究揭示了一个不那么令人惊讶的结果：精英学校的教育效益在很大程度上消失了。

examination_example.sentence: Data <highlight>reveals</highlight> that economic inequality rather than family income might affect people's wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数据显示，影响人们福祉的可能是经济不平等，而不是家庭收入。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 出人意料的真相透露；揭露的惊人内幕；启示；揭露；透露；暴露；泄露；惊人的新发现；《启示录》
adj. 透露内情的；披露性的；暴露的；袒胸露背的

word_family.mean: v. 透露；暴露；泄露；揭示；揭露；使显露；展现；显示；启示

sense_info_list.en: make previously unknown or secret information known to others

examination_example.sentence: Most people surveyed were reluctant to <highlight>reveal</highlight> what they ate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数被调查者不愿意透露他们吃了什么。

examination_example.sentence: Explaining what the data <highlight>revealed</highlight>, he said: "What you see is that even after three years, mental health is still better, which is unlike many other things that we think will make us happy. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在解释数据揭示的内容时说：“你可以看到，即使三年后，(这些人的)心理健康状况仍然很好，这与我们所认为的，使人们感到高兴的其他许多事情不同。”

examination_example.sentence: Instead of bringing families together, Aderhold's letter <highlight>revealed</highlight> a divide in the district, which has 9,700 students, and one that broke down roughly along racial lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿德霍尔德的信非没能让家长们团结起来，反而揭露了这个拥有9700名学生的学区存在的分歧，而且这种分歧大致是按照种族界限来划分的。

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow something to be seen

examination_example.sentence: That's the conclusion of a recently released study, which analyses 259 bottles from 11 brands sold in nine countries, <highlight>revealing</highlight> an average of 325 plastic particles per litre of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是最近发布的一项研究的结论，该研究分析了9个国家销售的11个品牌的259瓶瓶装水，结果显示每升水平均含有325个塑料颗粒。

examination_example.sentence: The results <highlight>reveal</highlight> that while Swedes were the tallest people in the world in 1914, Dutch men have risen from 12th place to claim top spot with an average height of 182.5cm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究结果显示，虽然瑞典人在1914年是世界上最高的人，但荷兰男性却从第12位上升到最高，平均身高182.5厘米。

examination_example.sentence: The latest in cat research <highlight>reveals</highlight> that the lovely animal seems to have a basic grasp on both the laws of physics and the ins and outs of cause and effect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最新的猫咪研究显示，可爱的动物似乎对物理定律和因果关系的来龙去脉都有基本的掌握。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It's a sort of observatory that <highlight>reveals</highlight> how the rivers are behaving from their own temporal frame (时间框架).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种观察站，按照河流的自身框架揭示了河流的“行为”。
